name: Hawaiian-style XL Extra Large Mens Shirt, Stunning black and red floral Smile :-)
description:
This truly is a shirt to make you smile!

Very 50's Elvis in 'Blue Hawaii'. 

Made from a lovely smooth cotton with a jet black ground and amazing rich red and golden floral design. The print is incredible, so intense! And a classic Hawaiian-style shirt shape that never goes out of fashion. Traditionally made throughout with machine fell seams and hand stitched finishing (no overlocking). Gorgeous vintage buttons. Will last and last!

This shirt is made to order, so print placement will differ slightly from model shown in the photo. I'm more than happy to answer questions and even send you a swatch if you would like, before you purchase. However, no refunds are offered. 

Great to wear with jeans or shorts, loose over a T shirt, or dress it up with a formal jacket. Chest measures 48".

name: Liberty Print Hawaiian-style Shirt Mens XL Tana Lawn
description:
This is a beautiful shirt, made from top-quality Liberty fabric. 

Tana lawn is a lovely weight, and it is super soft and comfortable. The fresh juicy colours in the print are great by themselves, or layered over a T-shirt. Also looks amazing for a formal occasion, perhaps with a suit for an autumn wedding? 

A great classic 50's shape, so rock and roll! Fantastic teamed with denim, as this really brings out the sky-blue. The fabric hangs beautifully, and this shirt is finished to a superb standard: all seams traditionally machine-felled (no overlocking), all hems stitched subtly by hand, and good stylish features like side vents and a button loop just under the collar. Liberty print is so special, and this garment should just get better and better as it is worn and washed.

This is an extra large shirt, designed to be worn loose or even layered as shown in the photos. Chest measures 48". 

I have more pictures which I am happy to send you if you contact me through Etsy. 

This item is made to order, so there are no refunds available. Please feel free to ask me questions first.

name: Vie en Rose Matisse Alexander Henry Hawaiian-style Shirt Mens XL
description:
This is a beautiful shirt, made from top-quality Alexander Henry fabric., with a gorgeous Matisse-inspired design in wonderful subtle colours.

This cotton is a great weight, and this shirt is fabulous by itself or layered over a T-shirt. A wonderful classic 50's shape, this shirt is so rock and roll! 

The fabric hangs beautifully, and the garment is finished to a superb standard: all seams traditionally machine-felled (no overlocking), all hems stitched subtly by hand, and good stylish features like side vents and a button loop just under the collar. Alexander Henry designs are instant classics, and this garment could really become a staple of your summer wardrobe- it should just get better and better as it is worn and washed.

This is an extra large shirt, designed to be worn loose or even layered over a T-shirt. Chest measures 48". 

I will posting more pictures showing the back etc... watch this space! This item is made to order, so there are no refunds available. Print placement may differ slightly from the item shown. Please feel free to ask me questions.

name: Fab 'Starry Starry Night' XL Hawaii Elvis shirt: autumn wedding, holiday or everyday
description:
Made from gorgeous light smooth cotton, this shirt is super quality and just gets better with wear. Soft charcoal grey with amazing light red stars with a touch of white.

A classic 1950's Hawaiian shape (popularised by Elvis) it is beautifully made with machine fell seams throughout, and loads of features like side vents and hand finished hems.

Great with shorts, jeans, over a T-shirt, or dressed up formally as shown, this subtle shirt will take you anywhere and fit in at any event. 

Size extra-large, chest is 46".

Made to order this item is non-refundable, but please feel free to ask any questions before you buy.

name: Handmade Mexican-inspired 'Day of the Dead' Rockabilly Shirt Hawaii XL Halloween
description:
Are you man enough?

This is a really charismatic rockabilly-style shirt, made from Alexander Henry printed cotton,which is amazing quality, as well as having a stunning print of skulls, skeleton couples and amazing florals. 

Great for any time of year and any occasion, but especially fab at Halloween/DÃ­a de los Muertos! Team with shorts, jeans and T-shirt, or dress it up with a smart jacket. Will look amazing at a party, or perhaps you want to subvert a formal occasion? 

One size: 
Chest measures 46"
Nape to hem 29"

Brilliant classic shape: 50's Hawaiian cut which never goes out of style.

Lots of features including side vents; hand stitched facings; top button loop; machine fell seams (i.e. no overlocking); contrast top stitching... a great shirt which will be an asset to any man's wardrobe. Caringly and accurately made to order. 

If you have any queries or would like to see more images please just ask.
